columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PX_HAC_USAGE
columns.description: Indicates how the procedure code was used in satisfying a hospital-acquired condition category.

columns.name: PX_HAC_USAGE_1
columns.description: Indicates how the first procedure code was used in satisfying a hospital-acquired condition category.

columns.name: PX_HAC_USAGE_2
columns.description: Indicates how the second procedure code was used in satisfying a hospital-acquired condition category.

columns.name: PX_HAC_USAGE_3
columns.description: Indicates how the third procedure code was used in satisfying a hospital-acquired condition category.

columns.name: PX_HAC_USAGE_4
columns.description: Indicates how the fourth procedure code was used in satisfying a hospital-acquired condition category.

columns.name: PX_HAC_USAGE_5
columns.description: Indicates how the fifth procedure code was used in satisfying a hospital-acquired condition category.
